readable.content: An elephant draped in red , blue and gold fabric walking on a stone path . An elephant is carrying something in its trunk and is covered by some bright-colored fabric . an elephant wearing a colorful drap carrying foliage in his trunk . An elephant wearing a red and blue scarf walks along the brick road . An elephant wearing red and blue fabric holds grass in his trunk .
